Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 17 Maggārammaṇattika » 17.1 Paṭiccavāra » 17.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Maggārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
26.
2494Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ…pe…  jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṃ. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2495Paccayānulomaṃ.
Paṭiccavāro.
